channel.title: scala on Life Universe and Everything
channel.description: Recent content in scala on Life Universe and Everything

item.title: Scala Setup
item.description: Preparation Step 1 - Java Installation Since scala runs on JVM we need java, it’s a good idea to install whole of jdk with it. Issuing command below will bring both JRE and Java to your machine. sudo apt-get install openjdk-8-jdk Step 2 - Download Scala You can get scala from Scala website - Go here. Scroll down the page and get a debian package, with extension as .deb. You can click on it to download - or just use the command below.
